question: Which of the following is the objective of the Nirmal scheme launched in Odisha?
option2: To upgrade the standards of ancillary services in healthcare sector
option4: To say no to open defecation
answer: To upgrade the standards of ancillary services in healthcare sector
explanation: Nirmal scheme was launched on 23rd June 2018. Its main objective is up-gradation of the standards of ancillary services in the healthcare sector like Laundry service, sanitation, lift, security, etc.
